description:
Momiji is a handsome and top-notch doctor who specializes in treating "mystery diseases." He`s a master of Ramune. One of his hobbies is to torment people and he`s especially strict with Ramune. Because he has no sense of direction, he always has "Pipopo" accompanied by him, a mystery pet that he created to guide him in the right direction.
Source: Official page
name: Momiji
